title: Uncle Si Is a Beast in the Kitchen
description:
Si makes it his mission to reproduce his mama's duck and dressing recipe, but Martin isn't convinced the secret ingredient is a winner. The boys are prepping for Christmas, remembering the greatest story ever told, and wondering what Jesus was like as a toddler. Si offers his insight on being rich vs. being poor. Martin and Willie just judged a sausage contest at the SEC Championship. Godwin is trying to decide what to cook tonight, the guys all share their grandparents' affinity for cornbread, and John-David reads an email from a fan looking for advice on dealing with anger issues.
-
